{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$3.9M in 2021-2022** on contracts with INFO TECH RESEARCH GROUP.

Across 244 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 8 have at least one amendment (3%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 89% and the average number of amendments was 1.12. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$181.0K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.76 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$69.7K. The longest contract was 3.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$368.9K.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
